alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 10:43AM CDT until April 04 at 6:36AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.2 feet, Hunters Ford Road is closed near this height. At 22.0 feet, Willman Road near the Highway 109 bridge becomes inundated and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.8 feet and nearing a crest. - Recent Activity...The river began a sharp rise Wednesday evening and first reached flood stage at 1:30 PM on Friday. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to below 10 feet on Monday. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Eureka 19.0 21.8 Sat 10 am 15.5 9.4 8.0 7.4 6.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
